reviewText: This is an excellent resource on how and why you should trade in more than one market. Though this video is almost ten years old by now, the concepts, and the instructors in depth knowledge still apply.

Even though this was addressing market conditions in 2005, its a very valuable DVD, especially at these prices. He gives a great snap shot of world economic dynamics. Plus very useful info on how to get into other markets and why you would want to.
